title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveToX Renata CrackInFloor -20 40>>
<<moveToY Renata CrackInFloor 0 40>>
Renata: Look at this crack in the ground!
<<moveToX Renata CrackInFloor -10 10>>
Mia: Renata! Stay away!
<<showLayer weakspot>>
<<moveDown Renata 10 120>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 120>>
<<hide Mia>>
<<hide Renata>>
Narrator: You have reached the end for now. Check back later for more content!
